title: 3 and Out -   Mahomes Motivation, 4th and Staley, Cowboys Concerns
itunes:title: 3 and Out -   Mahomes Motivation, 4th and Staley, Cowboys Concerns
description:
John explains why Patrick Mahomes has extra motivation heading into the season, if Chargers HC Brandon Staley will continue to go for it on 4th down or pull back after some late season disasters, why he has some major concerns about Mike McCarthy and the Cowboys, why Seattle can’t hide from their mismanagement without Russell Wilson, why teams with elite cultures can draft high risk/high reward players with character concerns. He also answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag.

Subscribe NOW and follow Middlekauff and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content. It's always  FanDuel for the best wagering action! #herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
